activities: MediaPlatform© delivers best-in-class webcasting and video management technology to global enterprises and digital media producers. Information, that does not personally identify users as individuals, is collected by the software (such as, by way of example, number of webcasts created and patterns of utilization) and is exclusively owned by MediaPlatform, Inc. This information can be utilized by MediaPlatform in such manner as MediaPlatform, in its sole discretion, deems appropriate.
